text: Ne (yitsulile) olwakhwakhola inzu ibe habundu wa Abandu okhutsia, ne nikhuyikhola habundu womulembe, Ne habundu wa Ibraheem yemanga nikhukholao mbu abe wakhulamilao, ne khwachelela Ibraheem nende Ismaeil, nikhubaboolela mbu; â€œtswenule inzu yanje khulwa balia bachibotokhananga (batufanga) nende bekhalanga, nende benamanga nende basujudanga
